features: BOTANICAL REED DIFFUSERS: These sophisticated reed diffusers include elegant dried flowers that add a charming and natural element to the diffuser, enhancing the overall aesthetic appeal.

WILD LAVENDER: The gentle and floral aroma of lavender promotes a sense of peace, harmony, and restfulness. Our reed diffuser provides a subtle and gentle fragrance that lingers in the air, creating a peaceful and harmonious atmosphere.

QUALITY MATERIALS: Made with natural essential oils for an authentic and high-quality fragrance, this 5 oz green glass reed diffuser comes in ready-to-give premium packaging. The dried flowers will elevate any room’s aesthetic.
THOUGHTFUL GIFT: Delight your loved ones with a gift that exudes elegance and luxury. These elegant green reed diffusers make a perfect present for housewarmings, birthdays, or any special occasion.

CRAFT & KIN GREEN AMBIENCE COLLECTION: We believe home is where we should feel as relaxed, calm, and refreshed as we do when walking in nature. This inspired our green collection with natural soy wax candles, classic reed diffusers, reed diffusers with flowers, and room sprays.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Long-lasting scent This reed diffuser will bring a lasting scent to your room Dried Flowers Mix Add the green touch of nature to any space with this beautiful flower mix. All-natural essential oil Experience the scents of nature in your home Reusable Green Glass Jar After you use up the essential oil, you can use the glass bottle for flowers. Gift-Ready Packaging Each reed diffuser comes in an elegant ready-to-give box. Next page 1 Long-lasting scent 2 Dried Flowers Mix 3 All-natural essential oil 4 Reusable Green Glass Jar 5 Gift-Ready Packaging

Experience Nature in Your Home These exquisite reed diffusers will help you experience the beauty and strength of nature in your home. Featuring 6 black sticks that allow you to control the strength of the aroma and a calming arrangement of dried flowers will add an elegant touch to any space.

Previous page Stone Fruit & Sage​ Juicy and succulent stone fruits are beautifully balanced by grounding and aromatic sage. Eucalyptus & Sicilian Citrus​ Cooling Eucalyptus and zesty Sicilian Citrus creates a refreshing and uplifting fragrance. Wild Lavender​ The gentle and floral aroma of lavender promotes peace, harmony, and restfulness. White Peony Tuberose​ Soft floral notes of white peony meet the heady aroma of tuberose for a sophisticated fragrance Santal Woods Warm and woody fragrance that combines the essence of sandalwood and a hint of exotic spices. Next page 1 Stone Fruit & Sage​ 2 Eucalyptus & Citrus​ 3 Wild Lavender​ 4 White Peony Tuberose​ 5 Santal Woods

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice and great smelling
reviews.reviewText: Looks well made and the smell is a nice soft scent that fills the room nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very cute! Only thing, it’s super strong smelling. Maybe don’t put all reeds in at once. Just a few at first and adjust from there based on your preference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The scent was nice, strong, not synthetic-scented and the bottle and reeds are pretty and look medium-to-high end as well. However, it wasn’t giftable since some of the oil had somehow leaked and gotten all over the bottle and its packaging. It wasn’t a significant leak since when I looked at the remaining amount in the bottle it seemed to still be pretty close to full. But regardless, it was still enough to coat the entire outside of the bottle. I cleaned it up and just kept it for myself as a result.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Looks great! Love the scent although it was very strong at first so I only used 2 reeds. After the scent started to fade I added additional reeds. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The santal woods scent is so perfect. Not too potent, but not too light. It's a perfect fit for the bathroom!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the softness of the aesthetic…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars EDITED AND UPDATED Chemical Smell
reviews.reviewText: I would like to add to this post that the seller read my review and reached out to me with an apology and an offer to make it right however I chose-either a new diffuser or a refund. I chose the refund and within an hour it was done along with a promise to look into why the smell was so strong. Huge shout out to this seller for wanting to make it right. That doesn't happen often anymore. Thank YOU!Super cute item but the smell is horrific. It smells like chemicals. I would have loved to send it back for a refund but it made my house smell so bad all I could focus on was getting it OUT. Threw it in my outside trashcan and the smell wandered into my garage and lasted for several days. I am usually ok with scents but this one was BAD.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Aesthetically pleasing. Fragrance is lacking
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful product. Love that it comes with dried plants to add to the decor. Unfortunately this smells nothing like Santal. I don’t get any notes that are even comparable. It is slightly woody, I’ll give it that, but the fragrance oil is very subdued.

I'm pleased with its minimalistic and attractive design. It adds a touch of sophistication to any room without being too flashy or intrusive. The sleek appearance blends seamlessly with my home decor, enhancing the ambiance effortlessly. Additionally, I appreciate that it doesn't take up much space, making it easy to place on a shelf or countertop without crowding the area.One notable aspect of this diffuser is its effectiveness in spreading fragrance throughout the room. I found that only three sticks were needed to fill my apartment space with a pleasant scent. However, I did notice that using more sticks could lead to an overpowering aroma, so it's best to start with a conservative number and adjust based on personal preference. Nonetheless, the diffuser efficiently creates a welcoming atmosphere, making it ideal for everyday use.Upon arrival, I did encounter a minor issue with the diffuser being a bit oily. However, it was a simple fix – a quick wipe with a paper towel removed the excess oil without any hassle. While this initial hiccup was a slight inconvenience, it didn't detract from the overall satisfaction I've had with the diffuser's performance. Overall, it's a stylish and practical addition to my home that I'm happy to have.

I took a chance on this, typically I have to physically smell the product and not go by the name itself. This one was pleasantly surprising! The scent is strong at first but then after a little while it becomes more subtle. I chose to place mine in our main downstairs bathroom. The bottle and reeds make for a nice display and the scent works nicely with the bathroom. It does not cover toilet smells entirely but it does keep the scent of bowels from wafting out into the hallway.There is quite a bit of product in the bottle so I imagine the usage goes on for a while. I'm 3 weeks in and not even at the halfway point. I flip my reeds every so often to keep the scent flowing. The product is a bit pricey but everything included is of good quality and given the longevity of the fragrance, it probably works out to be cheaper than continuously buying air fresheners. I should add that the fragrance is a nice natural one, not chemically or artificially-smelling. Additionally, being in the same room as the fragrance is not overpowering and doesn't make you choke. It's quite nice and I look forward to trying out scents from this company!

reviews.reviewTitle: Beautiful, natural smell and lovely. Look to the bottle and reeds.
reviews.reviewText: Everything about this Craft & Kin oil diffuser is luxury and quality! I went with the lavender scent, and it’s a really beautiful interpretation. It smells like lavender, but it’s not overly herbal, somehow they have captured the floral aspect of lavender in the scent of the oil. It’s absolutely beautiful and I can’t imagine anyone finding the smell offensive. The projection on this is decent, it is an oil diffuser, so it’s not meant to sent a large area, but it does a good job in the relatively small area where I placed it.I went with the lavender scent, and it’s a really beautiful interpretation. It smells like lavender, but it’s not overly herbal, somehow they have captured the floral aspect of lavender in the scent of the oil. It’s absolutely beautiful and I can’t imagine anyone finding the smell offensive. The projection on this is decent, it is an oil diffuser, so it’s not meant to send a large area, but it does a good job in the relatively small area where I placed it.One thing that really sets this particular oil diffuser part is that it comes with Black reads, as well as a bouquet of dried stems to put into the oil. The reeds are very nice quality and nice and thick which is why this item projects the scent so well. The stem bouquet contains real lavender that has been dried, and be aware that the lavender does lose seeds if not handled very gently. There are also several stems of dried eucalyptus, which I enjoyed so much taking out of the package because they have such a wonderful aroma. There are also a couple of other fluffy stems, which I don’t know the name of.I absolutely love this, it looks expensive. It smells expensive and it’s a pleasure to have in my house. I will re-order this for myself, as well as for gifts in the future.

reviews.reviewTitle: Brighten up your living space with this diffuser
reviews.reviewText: Imagine walking into your home and being greeted by the soothing scent of nature, seamlessly blending with the ambiance of your surroundings. That's the experience I've had with Craft & Kin Reed Diffusers, and let me tell you, it's been wonderful for setting the mood in my space.Pros:- Luxurious Scents: Craft & Kin offers a range of captivating scents, from the floral elegance of Wild Lavender to the musky allure of Santal Woods. Each fragrance is expertly crafted to evoke a sense of serenity and sophistication, enhancing your home with its aromatic presence.- Beautiful Design: The elegant glass bottles and natural reeds not only diffuse the scent but also serve as decorative accents in any room. Whether placed on a coffee table, bedside nightstand, or bathroom vanity, these diffusers add a touch of elegance to your decor.- Long-lasting: With their high-quality ingredients and thoughtful design, Craft & Kin diffusers provide long-lasting fragrance, ensuring your home stays beautifully scented day after day. Plus, you can adjust the intensity by adding or removing reeds to suit your preferences.In conclusion, Craft & Kin Reed Diffusers offer a luxurious and effective way to infuse your home with delightful fragrance and style. If you're looking to brighten your living space with the beauty of nature's scents, look no further. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewTitle: Gorgeous way of making your home smell lovely
reviews.reviewText: This reed diffuser comes with a beautiful glass bottle, a pack of 6 reed diffuser sticks, and a set of dried plants (which include lavender and eucalyptus). It's beautiful and a perfect addition to make your home smell and look good. The Santa vanilla musk is strong so I only put 3 of the 6 sticks in. This is just my preference. I would have given this a 5/5 but I would suggest to the company that they package their bottles a bit better. The box looked fine on the outside but when I opened it the bottle only had a thin plastic wrapping on the top of it, which had clearly leaked. Luckily not too much but enough that some got on the label and stained it, as you can see in the picture. I don't personally care, but would be disappointed if I was gifting this. Otherwise a solid product.
